meanings.definition: Of or relating to a stem or stalk
meanings.sent1: The cauline leaves of the plant were green and sturdy.
meanings.sent2: The gardener carefully examined the cauline structure of the flower stem.
meanings.sent3: The cauline stem seemed to be waving hello in the breeze.
meanings.sent4: The cauline branches intertwined like a dance in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The cauline growth was like a ladder reaching towards the sky.

meanings.definition: Growing on or arising from a stem or stalk
meanings.sent1: The cauline flowers bloomed brightly on the plant.
meanings.sent2: The tiny cauline buds were just starting to appear on the stem.
meanings.sent3: The cauline leaves looked like they were having a party on the stem.
meanings.sent4: The cauline petals reached out like arms from the stem.
meanings.sent5: The cauline growth was a beautiful addition to the plant.
